au.com.cybersearch2.classyinject

Class DI

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.com.cybersearch2.classyinject.DI

  • public class DI
extends Object
    DI Utility class for global dependency injection management
    Author:
    Andrew Bowley 28/04/2014

    • Constructor Detail

      • DI

        public DI(ApplicationModule applicationModule,
  Object... modules)
        Construct DI singleton object. If Android, then an Application object should be created to call this constructor when onCreate() is called.
        Parameters:
        applicationModule - The @Module annotated object defining all permanent bindings
        modules - Option additional @Module annotated objects required to make the resulting graph complete.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static DI getInstance()
        Returns DI singleton instance
        Returns:
        DI
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if called before singleton instantiated

      • inject

        public static <T> void inject(T injectee)
        Inject an object from the Object Graph
        Parameters:
        injectee - Object containing one or more @Inject annotated class members

      • add

        public static void add(Object... modules)
        Add @Module annotated objects to current ObjectGraph using plus() method
        Parameters:
        modules - Object array

      • inject

        public static <T> void inject(DependencyProvider<T> module,
              T injectee)
        Inject an object from the Object Graph and transient plus ObjectGraph
        Parameters:
        module - DependencyProvider of inject generic type - an @Module annotated object which defines the plus ObjectGraph
        injectee - Object containing one or more @Inject annotated class members

      • validate

        public void validate()
        Validate the ObjectGraph

      • createObjectGraphManager

        protected ObjectGraphManager createObjectGraphManager(List<Object> moduleList)
        Returns ObjectGraphManager delegate
        Parameters:
        moduleList - List of @Module annotated objects required to make the resulting graph complete
        Returns:
        ObjectGraphManager
